Package harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

Class TCardList

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<TCard>
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TCardList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<TCard>, java.util.Collection<TCard>, java.util.List<TCard>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class TCardList
extends java.util.ArrayList<TCard>
TCardList is an ArrayList specialization class helping to collect together set of cards and specifically to manage them during tombola games. During the cards generation processes, it is preferable to manage cards in groups of six of them, called series, thus TSeriesList objects target this need. During a game, instead, cards must be managed one at a time and TCardList objects are here to serve. In TCardList class are also implemented import methods and constructors to convert a TSeriesList object to a TCardList one.
Since:
1.8
Version:
1.1
Author:
Harry G. Potter harry.g.potter@gmail.com
See Also:
TGame, TSeriesList, Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class java.util.AbstractList

    modCount

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TCardList()
    Default constructor.
    TCardList​(TSeriesList seriesList)
    Create a new TCardList object and fill it using the cards within the TSeriesList object passed in input. Pay attention: cards are not copied, just passed by reference.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void resetGameStatus()
    Reset, for each card in the list, all the parameters maintaining status information related to a tombola game, such as extracted and matched numbers, eventually won awards, etc. Use this method to prepare a list of cards before start a new tombola game.

  • Constructor Details

    • TCardList

      public TCardList()
      Default constructor. It returns a new, empty TCardList object.

    • TCardList

      public TCardList​(TSeriesList seriesList)
      Create a new TCardList object and fill it using the cards within the TSeriesList object passed in input. Pay attention: cards are not copied, just passed by reference.
      Parameters:
      seriesList - The TSeriesList object containing the cards to import in the new TCardList object.

  • Method Details

    • resetGameStatus

      public void resetGameStatus()
      Reset, for each card in the list, all the parameters maintaining status information related to a tombola game, such as extracted and matched numbers, eventually won awards, etc. Use this method to prepare a list of cards before start a new tombola game.
      See Also:
      TGame
